problem.markdown:
1. The shear stress at any section of a shaft is maximum
(x) At top surface () At centre of section () At distance r/2 from centre () At distance 3r/4 from centre
2. Rate of loading for determination of shear strength parallel to the grain is
() 0.1 mm per minute () 0.8 mm per minute (x) 0.4 mm per minute () 0.6 mm per minute
3. What is Factor of Safety?
(x) Ultimate Stress/ working stress () Yield stress/ working stress () Load/ Area () Stress /strain
4. For which material the failure load is least?
(x) Wood () Mild-steel rod () Mild-steel plate
5. In shear test conducted for mild steel rod( M.S.R), mild steel plate( M.S.P) and timber( T), which is the correct order of shear strength obtained
() Timber in single shear > M.S.R in double shear > M.S.P in double shear (x) M.S.P in double shear > M.S.R in double shear > Timber in single shear () M.S.R in double shear > M.S.P in double shear > Timber in single shear () M.S.R in double shear > Timber in single shear > M.S.P in double shear
